- Invoice.Date = "25.01.2024" — Confidence: 99%

- Sender.VatId = "ATU39103108" — Confidence: 99%

- Vat.Rate = 10 — Confidence: 99%  
  Evidence: VAT rate shown as "10,00 %" in the VAT summary table.

- Net.Amount = 26539.20 — Confidence: 98%  
  Evidence: Shown as "Gesamtsumme netto 26.539,20" in the VAT summary; consistent with line-item sum. Formatting preserved (decimal places).

- Vat.Amount = 2653.92 — Confidence: 98%

No inference beyond explicit text; values reported correspond to visible invoice fields and cross-check arithmetically.
